name: Monstergirl Mansion
summary:
Monstergirl Mansion is a visual novel about a community of monstergirls taking care of their own. You are a monstergirl who needs a safe place to stay, and this is a place that's guaranteed to take you in. You can meet and romance all three of the mansion's caretakers over the course of your first three days at the mansion. 
 
10 endings 
3 romanceable characters 
26,000 words 
lots and lots of trans-affirming, queer-affirming, kink-affirming content
